title: Japanese video games adapted into movies - box office revenue 2017
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Film title (original writer company), and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Film title (original writer company) on the y axis.

The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) and lowest at Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega).
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Film title (original writer company) is 298.6.

max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Film title (original writer company), and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Film title (original writer company) on the y axis.

The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) and lowest at Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega).
Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: Afterlife (Capcom) has the second highest value for Revenue in million U.S. dollars.

The highest Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has 298.6 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega).

The Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Resident Evil: Afterlife (Capcom), and Resident Evil: Retribution (Capcom). Down to the Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) which is the lowest.
The Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) has 2.22 times less Revenue in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Film title (original writer company)s, we get total 1550.28.
